website_summaries.verdict: A compact and portable option for on the go.
pros: At just 4.5 x 4 x 2 inches and 8 ounces, it is easy to bring with you and fits in small spaces
It also generates ozone, which means it doesn't require a filter
Small but powerful, it is recommended for spaces up to 100 sq
ft., such as offices, closets, bathrooms, and dorm rooms
cons: Some users note an earthy smell coming from the ozone it generates

website_summaries.verdict: Fast and easy setup make this portable ozone generator a good choice for smaller rooms.
pros: Clears air and odors in small rooms like bedrooms, closets and bathrooms in minutes
cons: Fan runs louder than most PC power supply fans
Unit can fail sooner than other brands

customer_reviews.title: It is quite amazing. I have an office that can get a ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not write reviews though this thing really works. It is quite amazing. I have an office that can get a musty smell in it. My husband plugged it in and today when I went into it, it literally has the absence of any smells. It feels like the air is lighter and cleaner. I totally recommend this product and thank you who went before me to review this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Palomino

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Buyer
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into an apartment, and my neighbor smokes, and about 1 day per week, has a party or gathering, and all of their friends smoke. I purchased this unit for my restroom because the smell was extremely heavy there. The unit works perfectly. I am no longer overwhelmed by the smell of cigarettes in the bathroom. I will buy another unit for my kitchen, because now the smell seems to be coming through the wall in there. I read the EPA information, but I have used the device for about a week at the highest setting, combined with the bathroom vent, with no negative side effects.
customer_reviews.author: DLB

customer_reviews.title: Nice little unit!
customer_reviews.text: This ozone generator works exactly as described. I am using it in a small utility room that previously had cats in it. I did everything I could to try to get rid of the cat urine odor including the replacement of sheetrock and painting the floor with a heavy coat of KILZ odor stopping paint. I still had a slight cat urine odor until I plugged in the "Air Purifier". I like how the strength of the ozone can be adjusted by turning the knob. Again, I am using this in a small room, about 9' X 12'. It works well for me!
customer_reviews.author: Spokane Smith

customer_reviews.title: great for closets and boats
customer_reviews.text: i have a couple of these now. i keep them in the closets--twin 10 year old boys have stinky shoes--and it totally eliminates the funky smell they emit. i also keep one on my 30 year old sailboat. i crank it to high when i leave the boat and turn it down when i'm staying on it. it helps tremendously with damp and bilge boat odors. —update: for those of you who are experiencing the buzzing noise...clean the thing!! duh, it starts buzzing when dust builds up inside it. cotton swab in the outflow and air canister into the inflow
customer_reviews.author: RAS64

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This little suckered works! I plugged it in directly over the cat box and let me tell you...it makes a world of difference. I was skeptical bc it's so small and it definitely has its own scent but it's just a clean, plastic-y smell. Nothing horrible and way better than a cat box. You know.
customer_reviews.author: LiveWire7

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anyone who shares an apartment or lives above/beside smelly neighbors. Bought this for my daughter who gets migraines and lives in an apartment. She loves it and it has helped her tremendously. She has it in her bedroom. She wants them in every room now.
customer_reviews.author: ExerciseFriendly

customer_reviews.title: Product didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 units last August, which was less than two months ago. One already stopped working. It doesn’t disperse negative ions anymore (the purple light disappeared) and it makes a loud buzzing noise from the fan inside the unit. Waste of money. It says there is a 1 year warranty but I cannot contact the seller anymore form my past Amazon orders. *** UPDATE The seller did contact me and sent a replacement unit. The only problem is, they sent me a unit that is around half the price... Even on Amazon, the original unit I purchased (the circular one) is around $30, and the replacement unit (the rectangular one) the company sent is around $20.
customer_reviews.author: OneLoveOneBlood

customer_reviews.title: Aweful smell
customer_reviews.text: It smells worse than the odors I was trying to mask. Think newly open electronic smell.
customer_reviews.author: Troy C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: It leaves a horrible odor so strong I got a terrible headache. Only ran it about 10 minutes. It is not at all what I expected. I thought it was to eliminate odors! I don't have household odors but I thought it would be a good air purifier. NOT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Su Z Q Z

customer_reviews.title: this is our second one
customer_reviews.text: We have used our first one for about 6 months in various areas of our house including in the room with the kitty box. Then our daughter moved into an apartment that the previous renters had smoked in. She needed it worse than us so she took it. In about 3 weeks the smell in her apartment was almost completely gone. I missed having it at our house for just the clean scent and for when we travel and the cat box is "neglected" a bit so I bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: drnlp

customer_reviews.title: Usually after missing one day of scooping I can begin to smell it throughout the house and the laundry room was horrible. After using this
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats and keep their litter boxes in our upstairs laundry room. Even with scooping every day, I could not get rid of the litter box smell. I tried everything. I bought this as a last ditch effort and thought I wold give it a try. There is NO more cat box smell. It really does eliminate the odor. To test it, I did not scoop the litter boxes for 3 days. Usually after missing one day of scooping I can begin to smell it throughout the house and the laundry room was horrible. After using this, nothing. No litter box smell. I am amazed
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: In the trash now !!!
customer_reviews.text: Received Feb. 5th 2018 , worked well ONLY for one month !!! Do your homework , wish I did !!! See people get a company reply's saying company will help but from my homework that's as far as it goes ? My loss or really yours.
customer_reviews.author: Litefoot

customer_reviews.title: Effective and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: At night, my six small dogs live in my 10'x12' home office. I was using a bigger ozone generator but it put out too much. I couldn't stay in the room with it. This smaller device runs all the time and is doing a fine job of keeping down pet odors. Whenever I smell a bit of canine funk, I adjust the dial for increased ozone production. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star review is I haven't had it long enough to know how long it will last. Even if I have to replace it every year, it'll be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd T

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2.5 mo, buzzing/rattling
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and loved it. Purchased a second and 3 months in its already humming and buzzing. I tried cleaning it out but buzzing continues. Really disappointed as I felt that this worked really well
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Running extremely loud
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased the air purifiers I loved the products, they worked so well to eliminate odors for the first month, and then all of a sudden they started making these terrible loud noises and I had to turn them off. Very disappointed as I purchased 11 of them for our home and camper.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Donald Banks

customer_reviews.title: Better than an air exchanger
customer_reviews.text: This product is super simple and effective. Plug it in, turn the dial, and it eliminates annoying odors in short order. I purchased it for my small office in a basement and love how fresh my room smells now. I no longer worry about mold or stale air issues. Also, the ionic part assures me I am neutralizing the EMF's from my wireless electronics. I even tried it out in a bathroom first, to see how effective it was against odors, and it accomplished the job in half the time of my fan.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyRow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cigarette smoke smell!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, we purchased this in hopes to get rid of the cigarette smoke smell in our bathroom (from our upstairs neighbors) & it works! Just a light fan noise, but we don't mind the ambient noise & it's deadened when the door is closed. Really just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: It worked for us
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a mattress for my son. It is the kind that smells when unpacked. Directions said the smell could last for 2 days. I put this in his room, and closed the door. I let it run for about 5 hours. There was no chemical smell. The smell is like rain after a thunderstorm. I turned it off as it is not good to breathe the air directly. The bed also puffed up a lot more. It is great for getting smells out when used properly. My son also stunk up the bathroom. This is very good for that as well. Just close the bathroom door and let it do it's thing.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet odors
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I plugged it in to the outlet in my utility room (which is right off my kitchen)...... to keep down pet odors from the litterbox. Has variable settings and quite a bit of output on high. Nothing but nice thunderstorm smell where there was once kitty litter odor. I have vacuumed it once when I felt the output was sluggish from the dustiness of the room getting into the machine, and right back to normal function. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very surprised on how well this plugin works. (I have a an english bull mastiff that can be stinky sometimes) During the day, and when we're in the room I have this turned up about halfway. Constant unique clean smell. Before bed, I turn it up 3 quarters of the way up. When we wake up, the entire downstairs of the house smells fresh and clean. I will be purchasing more units for other areas of the house.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous-Idaho

customer_reviews.title: it does work...
customer_reviews.text: ... just not as described. Whisper quite my a**! As someone with 20+ years of experience building QUITE PCs, and using small fans in tight spaces to create airflow without much sound, I can tell you this is crap. It's just a cheap sleeve bearing fan. As a result it sounds like a vacuum. It does put out ozone though. I am returning mine post haste, but if you are going to use it I would suggest using it sparingly. Do not just leave it on. Turn it on for a while then turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Prophet360

customer_reviews.title: They just smell like dogs. No potty smells or accidents
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the small room my dogs sleep in. They just smell like dogs. No potty smells or accidents. There has been zero change in the reduction of pet smell.
customer_reviews.author: C. Byers

customer_reviews.title: excellent upon first use
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a couple of these . . . excellent upon first use . . . but now two of them are making so much noise you can't have them running if you are in the same room . . . Don't understand . . . How can they be serviced or do you just get to use them for a little while and then have to throw them away . . . They are quite pricey to just use them & then throw them . . . Suggestions please . . .
customer_reviews.author: Don McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: After two months the cheap plastic bearings in the fan go out and the fan roars so loud you can't stand it.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Pelto

customer_reviews.title: You can adjust the output of ozone.
customer_reviews.text: Solved the oder problem and the fan was pretty quite. The only negative was that it plugs directly into the wall and I only have one outlet that isn’t behind a piece of furniture and it isn’t in the best spot.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Goldie

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Mine quit working rather quickly. Then I looked more online and discovered that these are really not healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Kulp

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5 Bought 3 for bathrooms and kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 out of 5 Bought 3 for bathrooms and kitchen. Positive: it works fabulously for smelly smells And fresh feeling/smelling air. Negative: after a month one stopped working. If it wasn’t the last bit 5/5. But since one just stopped working 4/5.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, thank you Plixio! I use your plug-in air purifier one room at a time in a one BR apt. It most certainly improves air quality even on the lowest setting. My pup and I are now sleeping more comfortably. This would be a perfect gift for family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I am very familiar with ozone. I once rented a commercial grade generator for $200 after a horrible skunk incident. I now have a storage area in my basement that smelled stale and musty and I was concerned my christmas decor and other things would get musty. I figured would give this little plug-in unit a go. It certainly does emit a good amount of ozone, and my storage area is much fresher. If I do need to be in my storage area more than a minute or two I ventilate the area and turn the unit off. Ozone in high concentrations is not healthy to breathe.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Purifier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little air purifier. We use it in the bathroom to take away the musty odor and it works a treat. It is adjustable and reasonable quiet. Seriously considering getting a couple more for other rooms. You do notice an odor but it is not overwhelming and just smells fresh. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: C Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly well
customer_reviews.text: Life changing for our small beach condo! Does a fantastic job of eliminating orders and will never be without this product again.its been in use for a couple of more moths now and still working beautifully. Once it dies if ever I will be replacing it with another of the same! Do not hesitate to by this product!
customer_reviews.author: nona

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for 60 days - then it DIED
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for 2 months (to the day), when it abruptly died. Fan still ran, but blue indicator light was off, it no longer generated ozone.
customer_reviews.author: RockDoc

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I have a Saint Bernard plus a very humid house and no matter how much I clean and use air fresheners it will not compare to having this thing!! It literally cleans the air and leaves behind a clean, natural, fresh, purified smell. And it is mighty! Covers large areas quickly and intensity can be turned up or down. Buying more for each room!
customer_reviews.author: lauren gray

customer_reviews.title: USE FOR HUNTING CLOTHES
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over a year now and it def does the job. The ozone it creates takes the smell right out of my clothes. I place my clothes in a bag or sealed tub and let the ozone do its thing. Great product and def recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality fan bearings
customer_reviews.text: When i initially received this, i tested it out and everything worked fine. Tiny bit of ozone smell at first but that went away quickly. 2 Months in, the fan bearings are starting to go bad. This wasn't the quietest unit to start with, but the fan keeps getting louder and louder. I can currently hear it from a room away, but i have found fan bearings generally start degrading fast once they start.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Steffy

customer_reviews.title: Good While It Lasts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to put in my basement where my cat's litter box is located, and it masked the odor pretty well. If you read the fine print, it says to clean/vacuum regularly, which is a pain, but necessary. Even with the maintenance, it has stopped working after 9 months. I guess the cost was worth 9 months of fresh air, but I'm hoping to find a product that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Not So Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Lowered Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product when it worked, however, it stopped working two times. The first time, my husband cleaned out a filter inside the device and the second time, it stopped putting out ozone and he could not get it working again. I realize it is not an expensive unit in the first place, however, it sure would be nice to have a product last longer than ten months!
customer_reviews.author: timothy wiley

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office. It really isn’t quiet. And the smell that came out of it was so terrible I couldn’t stomach it for long. It had a fishy smell. I returned it. Not worth the price or nausea from the stench
customer_reviews.author: Kells79

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Air is pure like in mountains In Switzerland and i hope all viruses are also whipped out,that is very important in this corona times,it also clear air from bad smell from cooking,urine,smog,this product is a must!
customer_reviews.author: ADRIA

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality I have ever seen! GREAT CS!
customer_reviews.text: Worst quality I have ever seen! Bought 3 over last 1.5 months. One fan stopped after a few days, replaced the fan myself. The other 2 are dead, 1 in 2 weeks, the other one in 3 weeks! Raising to 4 stars. CS reacted momentarily with refunds. Very rare these days. I'd prefer working units over the refunds though:)
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Air Purifier
customer_reviews.text: It definately removes odors....it is a bit noisy, like white noise, but for the removal of odors, it is worth it and the dial of low to high is excellent. I left it on low and it did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne S

customer_reviews.title: Everything is better
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item. I plugged it in and instantly everything was better. I can't attest to the item's longevity, but even if I had to replace it every 6 months the price is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KC417

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just over a month before problems.
customer_reviews.text: So if you want a product that will last, I’m not sure if this is it. We ordered 3 of these and 1 had just broke, and a second is now starting to make a buzzing noise from the internal fan just like the 1st one that broke. They worked great until now. So maybe find another product which will last a bit longer. Weird thing is my friend turned me onto this product, which he had no problems with for over 2 years. Maybe the seller can send me 2 new ones if my 2 of 3 purchased were faulty.
customer_reviews.author: David Lewerentz

customer_reviews.title: Good small ozone machine
customer_reviews.text: Actually puts out a good amount of ozone. I'm using it in a small bin to "hopefully" sanitize my n95 masks and other gear. Also worked great in my van overnight.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mortenson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have a ild house that smells musty sometimes, plus 2 liter boxes. I am amazed at how well this cleans the air in a room. We use them in everyroom at least once a week, pkus the garage. Takes away the musty smell plus no odor from liter boxes
customer_reviews.author: Jessa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works to remove odors in small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: This is the new version of an older product I bought to rid my bathroom of a cigarette smoke odor that was creeping in from a neighboring apartment despite taping over vents and caulking all crevices. I'm happy to report this works just as well as its predecessor! I keep it running 24/7. There's a general humming sound which sounds like a white noise machine. Not bothersome to me, especially if it's in a room where you don't spend much time.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Weber

customer_reviews.title: 17 months is all it worked fulltime set at medium
customer_reviews.text: Bought August 2018. Fan making noise and the blue light no longer lights. Have kept it clean. Feb 2020. Now out of stock. Loved how it kept closet fresh and odorless from shoes and dirty clothes hamper in closet.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little “plug-in”!
customer_reviews.text: I have always enjoyed the smell of O3, just like after it rains! I like the convenience of a “plug-in” versus the cumbersome “stand-up” models that I have used!
customer_reviews.author: Deb W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I hated coming in my room bc it I had a shoe smell. It’s gone Praise the Lord. I just plugged it in a Wahla!!!! Yay!!!
customer_reviews.author: Apelles

customer_reviews.title: Loveit.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have this in my bathroom (which is a very busy place). I encourage everyone to turn it on when they go in if they expect to do "serious business" and leave it on when they leave. It really helps with odor control.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine M.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: We used 2 units for a stuffy, unpleasant smelling storage space and they have done a remarkable job making a pleasant place to be in. I highly recommend this product for anyone who wants to rid a small space of unpleasant smells.
customer_reviews.author: Irene P.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first
customer_reviews.text: We use this to help with everyday smells in a bedroom in our basement. It works well for the first couple of months then doesn’t seem to do much. We’ve purchased two now as the first broke after about a year or so. I don’t plan on buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked in my garage for cigarette smoke but stopped working fully after about 3 months with 1x weekly use.
customer_reviews.author: ditchqueen

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I received the plixio over the weekend. I was nicely surprised to see it works very well. I have two dogs and received visitors yesterday who told me the apartment smell so fresh. well worthy!! highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: yorlet torres

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very pleased with the purchase. Have used it for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: SKH

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable device
customer_reviews.text: The first one gave up the ghost after less than 24 hours. A prompt replacement arrived, courtesy of Amazon, and the second one has lasted less than 2 months. When it is working, it seems to do what its designed to do, albeit a bit noisily. The reliability factor kills any benefit rating it could earn BTW, a mail to the manufacturer/distributor has gone unanswered too
customer_reviews.author: L. Gren

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love these little ozone generators. The work great, especially in the kitchen. I tend to use them intermittently rather that keep them on continuously.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Value and support!!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer support. worked for a few weeks then stopped working but they sent me replacement. need to vacuum the little hole on regular basis if you want it to work long.
customer_reviews.author: Madame

customer_reviews.title: Works as described. I use it in my bedroom ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. I use it in my bedroom to eliminate tobacco smoke smell coming from another apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Faraci III

customer_reviews.title: This small thing really works. I placed it in ...
customer_reviews.text: This small thing really works. I placed it in my laundry room where there’s also a litter box. I generally turn off the ac when I leave for work and when I get home, I no longer get the musty smell or smells in general.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the variable output
customer_reviews.text: Love the variable output, and it isn't overwhelming like a larger whole house one...we are very happy with it, and it was delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jcfe

customer_reviews.title: like it!!
customer_reviews.text: Use this product in the bathroom....so far it is working great, illiminating odors quickly and leaving a fresh (almost like you have a pool in the room) smell.
customer_reviews.author: david cohen

customer_reviews.title: I don't normally post but this product is amazing for the size and price
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally post but this product is amazing for the size and price! We have it in our 26ft RV to help with dog/cat confinement smells and it works GREAT! Thank you!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but after a few uses I love it! It really helps eliminate oder. Super convenient to be able to move it around the house. It’s a little noisy but nothing terrible, and I don’t have to leave it on for very long anyway. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Smells are gone
customer_reviews.text: Had a musty walk in closet, I have had O3 generators before so I knew it would help with the odors. I think this is working, I have adjusted it to the point where I can just barely smell the O3. My only issue with it is the fan isn't the quietist, but can't complain for the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs to treat different rooms when needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs to treat different rooms when needed. Woks for mold odors and pet odors. I am sure it works for many more. Sort of like bleaching the air. Don't breath the air while treating. Air it out and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Perceptual

customer_reviews.title: Don't even waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work at all. Glad I only paid $19.99. What did I expect?
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: So far this little unit is doing exactly what I wanted. I am not sensitive to the smell and it leaves a fresh scent. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: fan failure
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit, and the unit(s) work well when new. Unfortunately, after a few months the fan motor starts to get loud and eventually fails. If not for this shortcoming in design, this product would most likely continue to operate successfully; generating adequate amounts of ozone.
customer_reviews.author: arc

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: One of the few portable cost effective ozone generator that worked. I used it in the bathroom. It had served my purposes well.
customer_reviews.author: Jtel87

customer_reviews.title: Only last about 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these both of them stop working after about 6 months. On one the fan got loud and stopped, the other stopped producing the ozone.
customer_reviews.author: Soulztooth

customer_reviews.title: They work great..
customer_reviews.text: I have four larger high-dollar air purifiers in my house. I have unplug those and now only use the plixio air purifying system. They work great....Paul
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lee Fesler

customer_reviews.title: Works, but smells Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Wanted for a large bathroom. The purified air smells like plastic to me.
customer_reviews.author: Slidellgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This emits an ozone smell and eliminates odors as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chai for Me

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate and results are amazing given the size. Easily handles a large bedroom and living room that mine are located. Want to order more but it seems that others have found out the results of the Plixio. RFW
customer_reviews.author: Bob  Wilman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Leave a weird smell in the space they are used. Very loud when running. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten B.

customer_reviews.title: works great as described
customer_reviews.text: works great as described , I use it in my closet and it makes a difference , you can adjust the Ozone as needed.very quiet too
customer_reviews.author: golfer

customer_reviews.title: Short product life
customer_reviews.text: These items work great at removing odors. I give this item a 5 star at odor removal; however, I’ve purchased 4 devices and 3 of the 4 have started makes loud screeching noises. I emailed the company’s customer service but did not receive a reply. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ORDER ELIMINATOR - PORTABLE MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: This portable order eliminating plug in is a must if you have dogs. You can transfer to any room. I ordered one for my neighbor. I will be ordering more for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Felecia Greer

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it at the end of November, 2018. Already doesn't work. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd had sooner!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. Was concerned how well it would work being so small but it's proven worth... love it
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: A must have for someone with cats.
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at how well this works. I put it in my laundry room to kill the cat litter odor and it works like a charm. If you have cat's, then you'll definitely want one of these, they're small, do the job, and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great for college dorm!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a college dorm room! It works for a room full of athletes
customer_reviews.author: Edwardo S Olvera

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 2nd floor condo which is a renovated apartment. Every morning, I walk into my living room to the wonderful smell of stale cigarettes from my downstairs neighbor. The air purifier arrived yesterday, right after I cooked cabbage. I plugged it in and turned it all the way up immediately. The cabbage smell was gone in 5 minutes. I woke up this morning, opened my bedroom door, walked into the living room, and took a nice big whiff. Guess what I smelled. Absolutely NOTHING!!!!! I sent a link to my mom for her kitty litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Andi

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought. They do great and last a really long time. Just need to remember to shut them off when the ozone smells. You know your room can't get any cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: I do like the Plixio Air Purifier
customer_reviews.text: I do like the Plixio Air Purifier. Reminds me of hepa filters I have used for larger areas in the past. I would like to know about the safety of using an extension cord to reach areas that have no receptacle.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dublin

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The first one stopped working within 2 weeks. I received a replacement for that one. The second one, from the initial pair, has stopped working, in less than one month. No return provided for this one.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works great and kills the litter box smell.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our car room/wash room. I vacuum it out once a month as the product stated and it keeps it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: Plixio Portable Plug-In Ionic Air Purifier works as described and I am very pleased with my purchase. I definitely recommend Plixio to any one who would like to remove toxins and undergoing detox. I have not stopped using it since I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Gpost

customer_reviews.title: Small But Mighty
customer_reviews.text: This company has excellent customer service and the unit It is a great value and works beautifully in my great room. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri L. Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This unit really puts out some ozone, works very well, great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: annalucia

customer_reviews.title: Loud noise
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of owning this product, it started making a loud noise. We had cleaned it per instructions too. Company will. It reply. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K Sladky

customer_reviews.title: This is a cool little ozone generator for rooms
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little ozone generator for rooms. I have one in my crawl space and one in my house. I've owned them for maybe 8 months now with no problems. I got one really wet one time--it was submerged in water--but it still runs.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Realty Assoc

customer_reviews.title: Two (in 2017) worked great.  2020, arrived dysfunctional.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two in 2017 and they were really great. The one I just ordered in 2020 arrived dysfunctional and wouldn't work. I'm hoping the return policy works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does work as described. And it does leave ...
customer_reviews.text: It does work as described. And it does leave the smell of ozone. I would have given it a higher rating, but it's VERY noisey. Much louder than a PC fan, as some reviews have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work after a week
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of these and they work for like a week ..then nothing
customer_reviews.author: elenitsa426

customer_reviews.title: No more pet smells
customer_reviews.text: This is super tiny but boy does it work great in my office

customer_reviews.title: Odor eliminaters
customer_reviews.text: Our homes for sale for odor control. We are purchasing more for our home

customer_reviews.title: So small, but yet so powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Placed in kitchen and by cat litter box and works beautifully

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Does a GREAT job clearing the air of cigarette smoke! Easy to use. Note: This device is for small rooms; you need something else if you have a big space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Plixio Portable Odor Eliminating Plug-in Ionic Air Purifier & Ozone Generator for Home or Office
feature_bullets: PORTABLE IONIZING AIR PURIFIER: The PLX50 portable ionic air purifier was designed to be sleek and compact. Its small size makes it perfect for use in the home, office, bathroom, closet or any space with limited air flow.

ATTACKS ODORS RATHER THAN JUST MASKING THEM: Ionic air purifiers help eliminate and neutralize airborne bacteria and odors. Ozone generators are unique in that they do not produce any chemical smells and do not require a filter.

FULLY ADJUSTABLE OZONE OUTPUT: This air cleaner comes in a sleek, modern design that enables you to control the ozone output with an adjustable dial. Adjust ozone output between a range of 10-50mg an hour.

MAKES LITTLE TO NO NOISE WHILE RUNNING: This portable air filtration system is compact enough to use anywhere and emits little to no noise while in use. This purifier saves on energy costs when compared to larger units as it is able to operate on less than seven watts.

CAN HELP WITH ALLERGIES AND COMMON ODORS: This air ionizer is great for any room in the house and can help alleviate asthma and allergy symptoms by attacking the source of odors and pollutants (such as cigarette smoke, pet odors, kitchen smells or mustiness) rather than just masking them.
